basic.name: Tasks Administration
basic.description: Privilege to administer other people's tasks. This is required in order to be able to access tasks from Task List Management

basic.name: Update Task Type
basic.description: Privilege to modify properties of a task type

basic.name: Delete Task Type
basic.description: Privilege to delete a task type

basic.name: Queue New Task Instance
basic.description: Privilege to queue new task of this type

basic.name: View Task Data
basic.description: Privilege to view task business data. This is required in order to be able to search for tasks in the Inbox and Task List Management

basic.name: View Task Info
basic.description: Privilege to view general task info

basic.name: View Task Audit
basic.description: Privilege to view task audit trail

basic.name: Complete Task
basic.description: Privilege to complete a task

basic.name: Cancel Task
basic.description: Privilege to cancel a task

basic.name: Suspend Task
basic.description: Privilege to suspend a task

basic.name: Resume Task
basic.description: Privilege to resume a task

basic.name: Delegate Task
basic.description: Privilege to delegate a task to people

basic.name: Accept Task
basic.description: Privilege to accept/unaccept a task to on behalf of other people

basic.name: Assign Task
basic.description: Privilege to assign the task to people

basic.name: Modify Task Data
basic.description: Privilege to modify task business data

basic.name: Modify Task Info
basic.description: Privilege to modify task general info

basic.name: Subscribe to a Task
basic.description: Privilege to subscribe to task notifications

basic.name: Rollback Task
basic.description: Privilege to rollback task state from audit trail

basic.name: Delete Task
basic.description: Privilege to delete a task

basic.name: Create New Rule
basic.description: Privilege to create new task rule

basic.name: Modify Rule
basic.description: Privilege to modify task rule

basic.name: Modify Rule Variables
basic.description: Privilege to modify task rule variables only

basic.name: Delete Rule
basic.description: Privilege to delete a task rule

basic.name: View Comments
basic.description: Privilege to view task comments

basic.name: Add Comment
basic.description: Privilege to add a new comment to a task

basic.name: Update Comment
basic.description: Privilege to update a comment added to a task

basic.name: Update Other People's Comment
basic.description: Privilege to update other people comment added to a task

basic.name: Delete Comments
basic.description: Privilege to delete a comment added to a task

basic.name: Delete Other People's Comment
basic.description: Privilege to delete other people comment added to a task

basic.name: View Collaboration Process
basic.description: Privilege to view task collaboration process

basic.name: Create Collaboration Process
basic.description: Privilege to create new collaboration tasks

basic.name: Update Collaboration Process
basic.description: Privilege to update collaboration process

basic.name: Delete Collaboration Process
basic.description: Privilege to delete collaboration process

basic.name: Search User's Collaboration Processes
basic.description: Privilege to search Collaboration Processes user participates with

basic.name: Search Other People's Collaboration Processes
basic.description: Privilege to search any collaboration processes

basic.name: View Task Inbox
basic.description: Privilege to view task inbox page
